Gabriel Fauré

Sonata in F major

1863 · N 5

Total duration: 11'

  • 1. Allegro ma non troppo
  • 2. Menuet: Tempo di menuetto
  • 3. Final: Allegro vivo

Recommended editions

  • Œuvres complètes (Bärenreiter) · VI/3 · BA 9471-01 · Œuvres pour piano á 2 mains III · ed. Jean-Pierre Bartoli

1. Allegro ma non troppo

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Menuet: Tempo di menuetto

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Final: Allegro vivo

Duration: 4' 30"

Difficulty: 3
